expo.name: Expo Playground
expo.description: an expo playground... examples of what apis are available

infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: to help the user see examples of face ID / touch ID usage

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: to allow the user to save photo/screenshot
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: to allow the user to load a photo from their device to modify
